title: VELCRO Brand Mounting Squares | Pack of 20 | 7/8 Inch White | Adhesive Sticky Back Hook and Loop Fasteners for Home, Office or Crafting | Strong Secure Hold
description: VELCRO Brand sticky back squares feature numerous applications to keep the office or classroom tidy. Sticky back hook and loop strip squares fasten items to desks and folders, stick nametags to back the back of chairs. Adhere your whiteboard erasers and markers to the board with our sticky back tape.
